Author: jl777c#5810
Content: we need to speedup the init time, do things in the background, do things in parallel, defer waiting for 100% complete

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: with many coins, if we require all coins to get to 100% initialized, then as we have more coins, the odds of a stuck init gets larger and larger

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and maybe the user didnt even care about that coin for that instance

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: "instant on" behavior is the goal and i think we can get very close to achieving this @Kiruel

Author: ca333#0118
Content: @jl777c i will check the init routine again but its launching coins in parallel already - what we could do is removing the "loading screen" and having the coins pop up in the dashboard as they init/connect one by one vs. waiting for all to finish the init/conn. This is likely a UX issue.

Author: yorklab#7270
Content: BTW, this has been resolved already but in case others ran into this issue, and as somebody has already mentioned, if you can't see your transactions of the coins then go into the AtomicDEX apps section in settings then "Clear Data" and "Clear Cache". Make sure you save you're seed first. That worked for me.

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Please do not clear data/cache if you have failed swaps with funds stuck

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Is there some reliable way to reproduce issue with coins tx history and is it actual for specific coins? Unfortunately on my side txhistory loading after different manipulations

Author: yorklab#7270
Content: My original issue was that I could see the transaction history of all the coins except for Morty. And once I tried to access the transaction history of Morty then I could no longer see the transaction history of any coins. After clearing data and clearing cache everything works fine now.

Author: 27aume#8635
Content:
Hi, about the fee structure. I think i dont understand it fully.
I made 4 KMD >LTC trades then resold back all at once LTC > KMD.
My initial balance was 7.77KMD and now its 5.9673KMD and 10~ cents of LTC.
This make 22.7799% fee.
Isnt it a bit high?
(Maybe some balances dont update properly)

Also as a feed back, wouldnt it be possible to give the 10%discount on fees when purchasing KMD with Xcoin. In other word 10%disc. for anytrade implying KMD, base or rel.
Thanks in advance.


.

Author: ca333#0118
Content: @27aume can you please provide your logs to @TonyL and/or @smk762 -  dracocanis ominator

Author: ca333#0118
Content: ref. the fee - these are hardcoded. But the price you buy/sell may be very different which in the end isnt the fee - but market/trade loss.

Author: cipi#4502
Content: Look at the prices your are buying/selling at... my node asks for 5% higher price when you buy LTC and bids 5% lower when you sell. Also beware the time difference between buy and sell, prices change.

Author: 27aume#8635
Content:
Yes i considered that but price did not change much. 
Yes i will send the logs thank you :)
